InclusionRules.name: No Platelet count > 100 on index date
No Pancytopenia or bone marrow disorder diagnosis within 7 days
No Neutropenia, Agranulocytosis diagnosis within 7 days
No low neutrophil count within 7 days
No low Hemoglobin measurement in blood within 7 days
